name: window-commands
description: A GNOME extension and CLI for window management commands

scripts.build: npm run build -w common && npm run build -w extension && npm run build -w cli && npm run copy-outputs
scripts.copy-outputs: mkdir -p dist && cp extension/dist/extension.js dist/ && cp cli/dist/cli.js dist/ && chmod +x dist/cli.js && cp common/dist/common.js dist/ && cp metadata.json dist/
scripts.clean: rm -rf dist extension/dist cli/dist extension/node_modules cli/node_modules node_modules
